title: Unexpected
description: He's so hot.But off limits.Younger than me.Yet still so mature.Worst of allâ€¦he's my daughter's new nanny.I don't mix business with pleasure.Or at least, I've never been tempted to until him.Unexpected is a fresh take on the single-parent/nanny romance with a guaranteed HEA. No cheating. No cliffhanger.
author: Jenna Hartley
